Text:
Wowsers!!!!!
Just love these jap monster flix!
Thankyouthankyouthankyou!

Indeed a different kind of cheese and cool in their own way...=)

Enjoy!!
I know it's not your main genre of uploads but any chance you might have Weekend Warriors,(alternative title: Hollywood Airforce). So far I've had NO luck finding it anywhere

Thanks. Could you possibly get The Beast Must Die 
1974 with Peter Cushing? I hope you can...

Howdy,

I don't usually up rips that are already here on The Bay, but the one copy is not seeded well so I'm going to go ahead and rip The Beast must Die and post when it's done.

Weekend Warriors is proving to be a tough one to get, but I'm not done trying yet!

Thanks!
